item.title: NPC talking
item.dc:creator: @JBJr JBJr
item.description:
@JBJr wrote:

umm so where do I put } else if (npcs[i].IsDead == true) {?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 12, 2007, 06:27:59 PM[/size][hr]I tried putting it like 8 different places near where you edit where npc’s say but none of em work so…where do I put it

Read full topic

item.title: NPC talking
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

[quote=“I Br3ndan I, post:20, topic:93577”]Ok fine. Do this. Search for

"moo"

In npcHandler.java, you should see something like this.

if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo"; } }

Underneath that, paste this.

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCIDHERE) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "WHAT YOU WAN'T NPC TO SAY HERE : STICK INSIDE THE INVERTED COMMA'S!!!!"; } }

Change the text and NPC ID to whatever…[/quote] THATS EXACTLY WHAT I TOLD HIM TO DO![quote=“tj007razor, post:7, topic:93577”]umm i don’t know if you got it already, but here

Open NPChandler.java and search for “moo” after the last } add something like this

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { // npc you want talking if (misc.random2(SPEED OF TEXT) == 1) { // speed you want it, i would suggest (misc.random2(25) == 1) npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = ("TEXT GOES HERE"); // text you want said } }[/quote]
AND U TOLD ME I WAS WRONG

Read full topic

item.title: NPC talking
item.dc:creator: @JBJr JBJr
item.description:
@JBJr wrote:

Alright so I’m trying to fix what the genie says while selling god armour, here’s what the code says before I tried changing it:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 3351) { // Genie - God armour if (misc.random2(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "I have the god saradomin, and other items!"; } }

Heres what I tried changing it to:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 3351) { // Genie - God armour if (misc.random2(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Armour of the Great Gods here!!"; } }

Read full topic

item.title: NPC talking
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Ok fine. Do this. Search for

"moo"

In npcHandler.java, you should see something like this.

if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo"; } }

Underneath that, paste this.

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCIDHERE) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "WHAT YOU WAN'T NPC TO SAY HERE : STICK INSIDE THE INVERTED COMMA'S!!!!"; } }

Change the text and NPC ID to whatever…

Read full topic

item.title: NPC talking
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

Dude are you saying if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { // npc you want talking if (misc.random2(SPEED OF TEXT) == 1) { // speed you want it, i would suggest (misc.random2(25) == 1) npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = ("TEXT GOES HERE"); // text you want said } } doesnt work? cause it does I’m using it.[quote=“I Br3ndan I, post:5, topic:93577”]If it’s text above their head, then you’re looking for it in npcHandler.java. Once you’re in there, search for what the text is, say a Guard Dog says “Ownage Ftw!”, you would search for

"Ownage ftw!"

Hope that helped. :)[/quote] He wants to know how to add it, not edit whats already there, If “Ownage ftw” isnt in his code, how does he find it?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

in public void process() { inside of npchandler.jave theres a piece of code that has “if” in front of it…thats an if statement try putting

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { // npc you want talking if (misc.random2(SPEED OF TEXT) == 1) { // speed you want it, i would suggest (misc.random2(25) == 1) npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = ("TEXT GOES HERE"); // text you want said } } right before it

item.title: NPC talking
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

umm i don’t know if you got it already, but here

Open NPChandler.java and search for “moo” after the last } add something like this

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { // npc you want talking if (misc.random2(SPEED OF TEXT) == 1) { // speed you want it, i would suggest (misc.random2(25) == 1) npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = ("TEXT GOES HERE"); // text you want said } }

Read full topic

item.title: NPC talking
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

If it’s text above their head, then you’re looking for it in npcHandler.java. Once you’re in there, search for what the text is, say a Guard Dog says “Ownage Ftw!”, you would search for

"Ownage ftw!"

Hope that helped.

Read full topic
